techmeme.title: Sources: Sam Altman and other OpenAI execs have been meeting with investors to advance a deal to spend tens of billions to build infrastructure for AI in the US (Bloomberg)
Pico 4 Ultra review: with imprecise hand tracking and few good MR apps, ByteDance's $600 headset is far behind the Quest 3 and works well only as a PC VR device (Josef Erl/MIXED Reality News)
In an internal letter, Snap CEO tries to rally staff amid a 48% stock price drop this year, says Snap will test new ad formats in the chat inbox and on Snap Map (Aisha Counts/Bloomberg)
Volkswagen rolls out its ChatGPT-integrated Plus Speech voice assistant in the US, starting with the 2025 Jetta and Jetta GLI; a subscription is required (Wes Davis/The Verge)
DOJ says it won't pressure social media companies to remove content about foreign threats to national security or elections, after claims platforms were coerced (Chris Strohm/Bloomberg)
